Title: Provides that an action on a money judgment shall be commenced within three years; repealer
Summary: Provides that an action on a money judgment shall be commenced within three years and shall be presumed to be paid and satisfied after the expiration of three years from the time when the party recovering the judgment was first entitled to enforce it.
LawCode: Rpld ยง211 sub (b), amd ยง214, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to the commencement of an action on a money judgment; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
